analyzed: dus mnyam pa'i dngos po gnyis la rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The present taste, etc. is not the cause of form, etc. because two simultaneous things are not cause and effect.

original: 'di la rtogs ba'i rim pa dang skye ba'i rim pa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di la rtogs ba'i rim pa dang skye ba'i rim pa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
translated: In this regard, two processes should be understood: the process of cognition and the process of arising.

original: de la mod las ni shes pa'i rim pas bshad do //
analyzed: de la mod las ni shes pa'i rim pas bshad do //
translated: The process of cognition is explained in terms of the order of consciousness.

original: 'grel ba las ni skye ba'i rim pa sngar bshad nas de'i rjes la rtogs pa'i rim pa bshad do //
analyzed: 'grel ba las ni skye ba'i rim pa sngar bshad nas de'i rjes la rtogs pa'i rim pa bshad do //
translated: In the commentary, the process of arising is explained first, and then the process of cognition.

original: grog mo'i nye bar len ba'i rgyu ni grog mo'i skad cig ma snga ma'o //
analyzed: grog mo'i nye bar len ba'i rgyu ni grog mo'i skad cig ma snga ma'o //
translated: The prior moment of the ant is the substantial cause of the subsequent moment of the ant.

original: de lhan cig byed pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bye brag char 'bab pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de lhan cig byed pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bye brag char 'bab pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The co-operating cause is the cause of the rain, which is the particular arising of the wind.

original: de'i phyir grog mo 'pho ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin char 'bab pa'i rgyu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lhan cig byed pa can nam /
analyzed: de'i phyir grog mo 'pho ba'i rgyu'i rang bzhin char 'bab pa'i rgyu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lhan cig byed pa can nam /
translated: Therefore, the nature of the cause of the movement of the ants is the co-operating cause of the arising of the cause of the rain.

original: grog mo'i 'pho ba'i nye bar len pa char 'bab pa'i rgyu 'byung bar 'gyur ba lhan cig byed pa yin pa nyid dpag pas char 'bab pa dpog pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: grog mo'i 'pho ba'i nye bar len pa char 'bab pa'i rgyu 'byung bar 'gyur ba lhan cig byed pa yin pa nyid dpag pas char 'bab pa dpog pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa'i rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: Or, the appropriated cause of the movement of the ants is the co-operating cause of the arising of the cause of the rain. Since the rain is inferred from the inference of the cause, it is an inference of the effect.

original: nya 'phar ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no ;
analyzed: nya 'phar ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no ;
translated: The inference of the rising of the fish and so on is similar.

original: / rva can yin te glang yin pa'i phyir ro zhes ba cha shas can gyis cha shas rtogs pa zhes bya ba rtags gsum pa las gzhan pa sde gzhan yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi rtags ma yin la dus mnyam pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i rtags ma yin zhing
analyzed: / rva can yin te glang yin pa'i phyir ro zhes ba cha shas can gyis cha shas rtogs pa zhes bya ba rtags gsum pa las gzhan pa sde gzhan yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi rtags ma yin la dus mnyam pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i rtags ma yin zhing
translated: The third type of reason is the inference of a part from the whole, as in the case of inferring the existence of an ox because there is a horned animal. This is not a reason of nature because it is a different type of reason than the three mentioned above. It is not a reason of effect because it is simultaneous.

original: dgag pa mi byed pas mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no snyam pa'o //
analyzed: dgag pa mi byed pas mi dmigs pa yang ma yin no snyam pa'o //
translated: and it is not non-apprehension because it does not negate.

original: spyi ru rnam par gzhag pa ni zhes bya ba ni glang nyid du'o //
analyzed: spyi ru rnam par gzhag pa ni zhes bya ba ni glang nyid du'o //
translated: The general arrangement is in the form of an elephant.

original: spyi can ni no ga pa dang ral sogs pa'o //
analyzed: spyi can ni no ga pa dang ral sogs pa'o //
translated: The general is the universal.

original: yang gzhan dag chu mi g-yo bar mthong nas de'i gting gi gzhi rjes su dpog ba yang snga ma'i tshul gyis rtags bzhi par 'dod de brten pas rten dpog @268b pa'o ;
analyzed: yang gzhan dag chu mi g-yo bar mthong nas de'i gting gi gzhi rjes su dpog ba yang snga ma'i tshul gyis rtags bzhi par 'dod de brten pas rten dpog @268b pa'o ;
translated: Others, seeing water unmoving, infer the ground of its depth, and they assert that the reason is the fourth in the above order.

original: / de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi chu zhes bya ba ni thur du mi ltung bar gnas pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: / de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi chu zhes bya ba ni thur du mi ltung bar gnas pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Water of that nature means having the nature of remaining without falling downward.

original: de gzhi las mngon par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi las skyes pa ste chu'i nye bar len pa dang gzhi'i nye bar len pa dag lhan cig byas bas chu brtan pa'i rang bzhin skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de gzhi las mngon par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi las skyes pa ste chu'i nye bar len pa dang gzhi'i nye bar len pa dag lhan cig byas bas chu brtan pa'i rang bzhin skyes pa'o //
translated: It is said to be engaged in the ground, born from the ground, because the water appropriation and the ground appropriation are jointly produced, and the water having the nature of stability is born.

original: de las phan pa nyams su myong ba med na zhes bya ba ni gzhi las chus khyad par cung zad ma thob na'o //
analyzed: de las phan pa nyams su myong ba med na zhes bya ba ni gzhi las chus khyad par cung zad ma thob na'o //
translated: If there is no experience of benefit from that means if there is not the slightest difference in the water from the ground,

original: de las gnas skabs kyi bye brag thob par mi rigs so zhes bya ba ni rten de las brten pa chu brten pa nyid thob par mi rigs ba ste phan pa med pa la rten dang brten pa nyid mi 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: de las gnas skabs kyi bye brag thob par mi rigs so zhes bya ba ni rten de las brten pa chu brten pa nyid thob par mi rigs ba ste phan pa med pa la rten dang brten pa nyid mi 'thad pa'o //
translated: It is not reasonable that the supported, the water, is obtained from the support, the cloud.üîΩIt is unreasonable that there is a support and supported when there is no benefit.

original: sngar brjod zin to zhes bya ba ni lan mang du'o //
analyzed: sngar brjod zin to zhes bya ba ni lan mang du'o //
translated: It was stated previously means many times.

original: yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rten dang brten pa sbyor ba'i 'brel pa yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya bas brtan par gzhi dang sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rten dang brten pa sbyor ba'i 'brel pa yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya bas brtan par gzhi dang sbyor ba'o //
translated: Because of correct application means that the connection of the application of the support and the supported is called correct application.

original: ci ste de dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba yin zhes bya ba ni rgyu cung zad med na yang dag par sbyor ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ste de dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba yin zhes bya ba ni rgyu cung zad med na yang dag par sbyor ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If there is no cause, correct application is not tenable.

original: gal te de dag las zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chud dang las yang dag par sbyor ba skye bo 'du bas so zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chu dag las yang dag par sbyor ba mi skye ba'i de dag la 'du ba ste de dang 'brel pa
analyzed: gal te de dag las zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chud dang las yang dag par sbyor ba skye bo 'du bas so zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chu dag las yang dag par sbyor ba mi skye ba'i de dag la 'du ba ste de dang 'brel pa
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is from those‚Äù means that the combination of the basis and water is the origination of the correct application.

original: ste / ci ste gcig la zhes bya ba ni rten nam chu la'o ;
analyzed: ste / ci ste gcig la zhes bya ba ni rten nam chu la'o ;
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is from one‚Äù means that it is from the basis or from the water.

original: / de ltar na yang dag par sbyor ba rten med kyang chu 'ba' zhig brtan par gnas par rung ba'o //
analyzed: / de ltar na yang dag par sbyor ba rten med kyang chu 'ba' zhig brtan par gnas par rung ba'o //
translated: Thus, the correct application is without a basis, but it is possible that only the water remains stable.

original: gal te de las mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gcig kho na la'o //
analyzed: gal te de las mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gcig kho na la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf it is not possible from that‚Äù means that it is from only one.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chu dag khyad par skyes pa'i phan par bya ba dang / phan par byed pa ma yin pa 'dra bas so //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chu dag khyad par skyes pa'i phan par bya ba dang / phan par byed pa ma yin pa 'dra bas so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause of similarity‚Äù means that the basis and the water are similar in being the object that is benefited and the benefactor, respectively, that is produced by the difference.

original: phan pa med pa de'i phyir yang dag par sbyor ba las gzhi dang chu dag yang dag par sbyor ba de dang ldan pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan pa med pa de'i phyir yang dag par sbyor ba las gzhi dang chu dag yang dag par sbyor ba de dang ldan pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is not helpful, therefore, the basis and water that are connected to the correct application would not be said to possess that correct application.

original: yang na yang dag par sbyor ba la yang dag par sbyar bar bya ba bzhin dang / chu de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na yang dag par sbyor ba la yang dag par sbyar bar bya ba bzhin dang / chu de dag dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, the correct application would not be connected to the water and the basis, as if it were something to be connected.

original: de dang mi ldan na yang de las brtan par gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩgal te lhan cig pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chu lhan cig tshogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de dang mi ldan na yang de las brtan par gnas par mi 'gyur ro // gal te lhan cig pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhi dang chu lhan cig tshogs pa la'o //
translated: And if it were not connected to them, it would not be stable in them.üîΩIf it is in the simultaneous, it is in the collection of the basis and water that are simultaneous.

original: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i stobs kyis chu dang gzhi dag la dang de dag gis kyang yang dag par sbyor ba @269a * //
analyzed: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i stobs kyis chu dang gzhi dag la dang de dag gis kyang yang dag par sbyor ba @269a * //
translated: Mutually means that by the power of the correct application, the water and the basis are in it, and they are also in the correct application.

original: la'o ; / bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed ba ma yin ba la zhes bya ba ni yang dag bar sbyor bas ni dus gcig pa'i rten dang brten bdag 'brel par byed ba'i phyir 'brel pa can dag phan tshun bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed bdag
analyzed: la'o ; / bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed ba ma yin ba la zhes bya ba ni yang dag bar sbyor bas ni dus gcig pa'i rten dang brten bdag 'brel par byed ba'i phyir 'brel pa can dag phan tshun bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed bdag
translated: ‚ÄúNeither that which is to be produced nor that which produces‚Äù means that the related things are not each other‚Äôs mutual producers, because the proper conjunction causes the simultaneous support and the supported to be related.

original: med pas so //
analyzed: med pas so //
translated: Because they do not exist.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bo la ni sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bo la ni sgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: That is why he says, ‚Äúbecause of the establishment of their own nature.‚Äù

original: 'brel pa can dag gsum pa 'brel bdag tu mnyam bar 'brel ba yin pa'i phyir gsum ga yang grub zin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa can dag gsum pa 'brel bdag tu mnyam bar 'brel ba yin pa'i phyir gsum ga yang grub zin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the three are related as the third, the relation, all three are already established.

original: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba'i chos dag gi ngo bo las gzhan ba'i phan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba'i chos dag gi ngo bo las gzhan ba'i phan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy another‚Äù means by the nature of the related things, which is different from the relation.

original: rnam pa gang gis kyang zhes bya ba ni rang ngam gzhan gyi ngo bo gang gis kyang ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis kyang zhes bya ba ni rang ngam gzhan gyi ngo bo gang gis kyang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúBy any kind‚Äù means by any kind of nature, either of itself or of another.

original: de'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi 'brel ba nyid ni zhes bya ba ni dngos bo tha dad pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyi 'brel ba nyid ni zhes bya ba ni dngos bo tha dad pa'i'o //
translated: Therefore, the relation of all things, i.e., of different things, is not like that of the produced and the producer.

original: de dag la zhes bya ba ni bum ba dang sa gzhi dang btar dang rgya shugs dang chu dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag la zhes bya ba ni bum ba dang sa gzhi dang btar dang rgya shugs dang chu dag la'o //
translated: In those, i.e., in the pot, the ground, the water, the grape, and the wine,

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi tha snyad ces bya ba ni rten dang brten pa'i'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi tha snyad ces bya ba ni rten dang brten pa'i'o //
translated: the convention of such a nature, i.e., of the supported and the support,

original: bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po de bum pa'i lhan cig byed ba dang chu'i nye bar len ba dag lhan cig byas bar chu brten pa nyid du skye las gzhi la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa'i dngos po de bum pa'i lhan cig byed ba dang chu'i nye bar len ba dag lhan cig byas bar chu brten pa nyid du skye las gzhi la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: is the relation of the produced and the producer, i.e., the co-operation of the pot and the co-operation of the water in the production of the wine. The ground, etc., are also like that.

original: 'di dag de'i med na mi 'byung ba ma yin ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di rten dang brten pa zhes bya ba 'di dag yang dag par sbyor ba de'i med na mi 'byung ba ma yin te rten dang brten du 'dod pa tsam gyis de la brten pa'i
analyzed: 'di dag de'i med na mi 'byung ba ma yin ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di rten dang brten pa zhes bya ba 'di dag yang dag par sbyor ba de'i med na mi 'byung ba ma yin te rten dang brten du 'dod pa tsam gyis de la brten pa'i
translated: Because they are not the non-existence of that, i.e., because the supported and the support are not the non-existence of the relation of the supported and the support, the relation of the supported and the support is not like the relation of the produced and the producer.

original: mtshan nyid 'grub pa'i phyir brgyud pas btags pa ni brgyud ba yang ma yin la btags pa yang ma yin pas brgyud pas btags pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'grub pa'i phyir brgyud pas btags pa ni brgyud ba yang ma yin la btags pa yang ma yin pas brgyud pas btags pa ste /
translated: It is not indirect designation, nor is it direct designation, but it is indirect designation.

original: de la rten dang brten par 'dod pa gnyis las ni yang dag bar sbyor ba nus pa'o //üîΩde las ni de brten pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la rten dang brten par 'dod pa gnyis las ni yang dag bar sbyor ba nus pa'o // de las ni de brten pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Of the two, the basis and the dependent, the latter is the nature of the former.

original: de nyid brtag pa ste yang dag par sbyor ba tshad mas grub ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid brtag pa ste yang dag par sbyor ba tshad mas grub ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is to be examined, because the direct designation is not established by valid cognition.

original: don med ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rten dang brten pa dag yod pa tsam gyis brten pa'i gnas bar 'grub bar tshad mas 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rten dang brten pa dag yod pa tsam gyis brten pa'i gnas bar 'grub bar tshad mas 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is meaningless, the basis is established as the abode of the dependent by valid cognition, merely by the existence of the basis and the dependent.

original: phan btags bas bshad pa ni gnas pa brten ba nyid yin na ni de dus mnyam pa la mi 'thad de grub zin pa la phan ba mi srid pas so //
analyzed: phan btags bas bshad pa ni gnas pa brten ba nyid yin na ni de dus mnyam pa la mi 'thad de grub zin pa la phan ba mi srid pas so //
translated: If the abode is the dependent itself, that is not tenable at the same time, because it is already established and help is not possible.

original: gzhan du gyur pa yang de la phan pa ma yin no zhes @269b so ;
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa yang de la phan pa ma yin no zhes @269b so ;
translated: Nor is it help for that which has become different.

original: / gags byed pa yang ci zhig ces bya ba ni de nyid dam de ma yin ba zhig ces btags pa'o //
analyzed: / gags byed pa yang ci zhig ces bya ba ni de nyid dam de ma yin ba zhig ces btags pa'o //
translated: What is the obstruction? It is either that itself or something else.

original: de la rtog ba dang po'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: de la rtog ba dang po'i dbang du byas te /
translated: With regard to that, the first hypothesis is considered.

original: de'i ltung ba'i gags byed ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gang gnas ba de nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur ba'i gags byed ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ltung ba'i gags byed ba'i phyir zhes bya ba gang gnas ba de nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur ba'i gags byed ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the obstruction of its falling, it is the obstruction of the nature of that which is situated.

original: de kho na la zhes bya ba ni brten pa'i chos las gzhan du gyur ba'i gags zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin te de nyid la gzhi nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir brten pa'i dbang po la ni ci yang mi byed pa'i phyir gzhi de ji ltar brten pa'i dbangüîΩpo ltung ba'i gnas yin te /
analyzed: de kho na la zhes bya ba ni brten pa'i chos las gzhan du gyur ba'i gags zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin te de nyid la gzhi nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir brten pa'i dbang po la ni ci yang mi byed pa'i phyir gzhi de ji ltar brten pa'i dbang po ltung ba'i gnas yin te /
translated: That itself is the obstruction called the nature of something other than the situated dharma. Because the basis is applied to that itself, it does not do anything to the situated faculty. How is that basis the situated faculty's place of falling?üîΩBecause it is the obstruction, it does not fall.

original: gags byed bas mi ltung ngo zhes bya ba ni gzhi gags la gags kyis mi ltung bar byed do zhes bya bar rtogs na yang ngo //
analyzed: gags byed bas mi ltung ngo zhes bya ba ni gzhi gags la gags kyis mi ltung bar byed do zhes bya bar rtogs na yang ngo //
translated: If one understands that the obstruction of the basis is the obstruction of the falling of the basis, then it is so.

original: mi ltung ba de yang brten pa'i dngos bo de nyid dam de ma yin zhes brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs so //
analyzed: mi ltung ba de yang brten pa'i dngos bo de nyid dam de ma yin zhes brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs so //
translated: And it is the same to argue whether that which does not fall is that very thing which is supported or something other than it.

original: gags kyi tshigs don byas pa zhes bya bar de cung zad byas pa zhig yin par bshad na yang de mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gags kyi tshigs don byas pa zhes bya bar de cung zad byas pa zhig yin par bshad na yang de mi 'thad de /
translated: If it is said that the obstruction is that which has performed its function, it is not tenable to say that it is that which has performed a little of its function.

original: thug pa med par yang 'gyur te zhes bya bar ni khyad par de las khyad par 'ga' zhig ma thob na ni de'i khyad par du yang mi 'gyur la de las khyad par gnyis pa zhig thob na yang snga ma ltar brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par
analyzed: thug pa med par yang 'gyur te zhes bya bar ni khyad par de las khyad par 'ga' zhig ma thob na ni de'i khyad par du yang mi 'gyur la de las khyad par gnyis pa zhig thob na yang snga ma ltar brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir khyad par
translated: And there would be an infinite regress, because if one did not obtain some difference from that difference, it would not be a difference from it. And if one obtained a second difference from that, the same argument would apply as before.

original: rnams thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnams thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore the differences would be infinite.

original: gnod pa de dag gi rtsa ba de ni de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phan pa khas mi len ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod pa de dag gi rtsa ba de ni de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i phan pa khas mi len ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The root of those faults is the non-acceptance of the benefit that is the nature of that.

original: de yang cis na khas mi len zhe na /
analyzed: de yang cis na khas mi len zhe na /
translated: And why is that not accepted?

original: de khas blangs na de'i rang bzhin rten las grub par gyur la de lta na yang rgyu dang 'bras bug 'gyur zhing rten de las rtogs ba yang 'bras bu'i rtags las skye bar 'gyur du 'ongs pas so //
analyzed: de khas blangs na de'i rang bzhin rten las grub par gyur la de lta na yang rgyu dang 'bras bug 'gyur zhing rten de las rtogs ba yang 'bras bu'i rtags las skye bar 'gyur du 'ongs pas so //
translated: If you accept that, then its nature would be established from a basis.  And if that were so, then there would be a cause and effect, and the realization from that basis would come to arise from the effect.

original: rang gi bdag nyid gzhan du ma gyur pa'i phan ba mi 'thad pa de'i phyir ltung ba med pa'i gags yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid gzhan du ma gyur pa'i phan ba mi 'thad pa de'i phyir ltung ba med pa'i gags yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not tenable that something that has not changed from its own state is a basis, then

original: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba le'u gnyis pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags bshad pa la sogs par bshad pa ltar ro //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba le'u gnyis pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtags bshad pa la sogs par bshad pa ltar ro //
translated: the consequence is as before.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'di byed pa'i dngos po 'gog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'di byed pa'i dngos po 'gog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to show that, he says, ‚ÄúThe refutation of the entity that does this . . .‚ÄùüîΩAnd that is accepted.

original: de yang 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhi ltung ba mi byed do zhes kho bo la grub zin pa'i phyir khyed kyis brjod pa ni don med do //
analyzed: de yang 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhi ltung ba mi byed do zhes kho bo la grub zin pa'i phyir khyed kyis brjod pa ni don med do //
translated: Since it is established for us that the basis is not a basis, your statement is meaningless.

original: de la yang nyes pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir de ltar ltung ba de byas ba med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos @270a * //
analyzed: de la yang nyes pa gzhan bstan pa'i phyir de ltar ltung ba de byas ba med kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos @270a * //
translated: In order to demonstrate another fault, he says, ‚ÄúEven if that fall is not made, etc.

original: so ; / skad cig ma'i dngos bo rnams zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis lhan cig byas pa'i rgyun skad cig ma gzhan la skye bar rung ba'o //
analyzed: so ; / skad cig ma'i dngos bo rnams zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis lhan cig byas pa'i rgyun skad cig ma gzhan la skye bar rung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThings that are momentary‚Äù are things that are produced in another moment by a cause that is simultaneously produced with them.

original: de la yang brten pa'i rgyu dang yul mtshungs ba nyid skye ba ste /
analyzed: de la yang brten pa'i rgyu dang yul mtshungs ba nyid skye ba ste /
translated: In that case, the cause that is the basis and the object that is similar to it are produced.

original: de dang nye bar 'bras bu'i rgyun skye ba'o //
analyzed: de dang nye bar 'bras bu'i rgyun skye ba'o //
translated: The continuum of the effect is produced in dependence on that.

original: gzhi la skye bar grub po zhes bya ba ni de las skyes pa'i rtags can shes pa yang 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro //üîΩ'bras bu'i zhes rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba ni mdo snga ma las bdag nyid de 'dra'i rgyu /
analyzed: gzhi la skye bar grub po zhes bya ba ni de las skyes pa'i rtags can shes pa yang 'bras bu'i rtags las skyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro // 'bras bu'i zhes rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba ni mdo snga ma las bdag nyid de 'dra'i rgyu /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is established that it is produced in the basis‚Äù means that the cognition that has the sign of being produced from that is also produced from the sign of the effect.

original: de'i 'bras bu zhes smos pa ltar ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu zhes smos pa ltar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe effect is applied‚Äù means that the cause that has that kind of nature in the previous s≈´tra is called ‚Äúthe effect of that.‚Äù

original: med pa mi 'byung bar nges ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa med par yang gtan tshigs su 'dod par 'byung srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa mi 'byung bar nges ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa med par yang gtan tshigs su 'dod par 'byung srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is possible that the reason is accepted even when the probandum is not accepted.

original: rtogs ba rnams kyi sgrub byed min //
analyzed: rtogs ba rnams kyi sgrub byed min //
translated: It is not a proof for the realized.

original: zhes bya ba ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that it is a fallacious reason for the disputants and opponents.

original: shes byed yan lag kyang ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: shes byed yan lag kyang ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the branch of the proof?

original: gtan tshigs kyang tshul gsum pa go bar byed pa yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang tshul gsum pa go bar byed pa yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The reason is also that which causes understanding of the trimodal condition.

original: ma 'brel pas ni mi rtogs te //
analyzed: ma 'brel pas ni mi rtogs te //
translated: It is not understood through non-connection.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos can dang sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos dag dang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos can dang sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos dag dang ngo //
translated: This is the subject and the property to be proven.

original: de la chos can dang ma 'brel ba go bar mi byed pa bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩtshad ma la sogs pa mthong ba ste /
analyzed: de la chos can dang ma 'brel ba go bar mi byed pa bstan pa'i phyir / tshad ma la sogs pa mthong ba ste /
translated: In order to demonstrate that what is not connected to the subject does not cause understanding,üîΩit is said: seeing valid cognition, etc.

original: sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos dang 'brel ba mthong ba yang ngo //
analyzed: sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos dang 'brel ba mthong ba yang ngo //
translated: Seeing what is connected to the property to be proven.

original: rgya mtshor me bzhin zhes bya ba ni chos can dang 'brel par ma grub pa'i dper brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rgya mtshor me bzhin zhes bya ba ni chos can dang 'brel par ma grub pa'i dper brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúLike fire in water‚Äù is an example of a reason that is not established as related to the subject.

original: ma 'brel bas zhes bya ba ni chos can dang chos dag dang ngo //
analyzed: ma 'brel bas zhes bya ba ni chos can dang chos dag dang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause it is not related‚Äù means that the reason is not related to the subject or to the property to be proven.

original: go bar bya ba dang / go bar byed pa dag gi cig gam gnyi ga lam grub pas the tshem za ba ni ci rigs par de dag nyid kyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin te rgol ba la ma grub pa dang phyir rgol ba gnyi ga la ma grub pa zhes bya ba'o
analyzed: go bar bya ba dang / go bar byed pa dag gi cig gam gnyi ga lam grub pas the tshem za ba ni ci rigs par de dag nyid kyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin te rgol ba la ma grub pa dang phyir rgol ba gnyi ga la ma grub pa zhes bya ba'o
translated: A reason that is uncertain is a reason that is either unestablished for one or both parties, as appropriate. It is a fallacious reason because it is unestablished for the opponent or because it is unestablished for both parties.

original: // the tshom za ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: // the tshom za ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: An uncertain reason is similar to that.

original: gcig rab ma grub the tshom za //
analyzed: gcig rab ma grub the tshom za //
translated: One is unestablished, the other is uncertain.

original: zhes bya ba ni ci rigs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ci rigs pa ste /
translated: This is as appropriate.

original: chos can dang ma 'brel pa'i don gcig ma grub bam the tshom za ba ni ma grub ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos can dang ma 'brel pa'i don gcig ma grub bam the tshom za ba ni ma grub ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If the meaning of ‚Äúnot related to the subject‚Äù is that one of the two is unestablished or uncertain, it is called ‚Äúunestablished.‚Äù

original: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa gcig gam /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa gcig gam /
translated: If it is that the reason exists only in similar instances,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid gcig ma grub bam the tshom za na 'khrul par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid gcig ma grub bam the tshom za na 'khrul par 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If the nonexistence of the counter-correlate is not established or is doubted, then there is error.

original: gnyis ma grub ba dang the tshom za zhes bya ba ni @270b mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid dag gcig rab ma grub na 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro //üîΩthe tshom zan 'khrul ba can //
analyzed: gnyis ma grub ba dang the tshom za zhes bya ba ni @270b mi mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa nyid dag gcig rab ma grub na 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya bar sbyar ro // the tshom zan 'khrul ba can //
translated: If the existence of the counter-correlate and the nonexistence of the counter-correlate are not established or are doubted, then there is contradiction.üîΩIf there is doubt, then there is error.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If there is doubt, then there is error.

original: 'chi ba khas blangs nas sems pa can nyid ji ltar khas blangs par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: 'chi ba khas blangs nas sems pa can nyid ji ltar khas blangs par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: How could one who accepts death be a sentient being?

original: rnam par shes pa 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'chi ba khas blangs na'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'chi ba khas blangs na'o //
translated: If one accepts death, which is characterized by the cessation of consciousness.üîΩIf you say that it is because the word death applies to it,

original: gal te 'chi ba'i sgra la 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni shun lpags bshus nas 'chi'o zhes grags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'chi ba'i sgra la 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni shun lpags bshus nas 'chi'o zhes grags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: then it is like the peeling of a plantain.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it would follow that there would be an extreme fallacy.

original: sbras gang brjod par grub par thal ba ste /
analyzed: sbras gang brjod par grub par thal ba ste /
translated: The meaning of the statement is that it would follow that the proof would be established.

original: dper na chu ngogs stong pa la chu 'gram ni bu ram gyi phung po yod do zhes brjod na yang de yod pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na chu ngogs stong pa la chu 'gram ni bu ram gyi phung po yod do zhes brjod na yang de yod pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: For example, if one says, ‚ÄúOn the empty riverbank, there is a pile of sugar cane,‚Äù then the existence of that is established.üîΩBut the thing to be understood by the reason is not established.

original: ngos pos go bar bya ba'i dngos po grub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rtags dngos por gyur pas go bar bya ba'i chos dngos po grub pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: ngos pos go bar bya ba'i dngos po grub pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rtags dngos por gyur pas go bar bya ba'i chos dngos po grub pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The reason is a thing, but the property to be proven, the thing to be understood, is not established.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: sgra'i don tsam zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sgra'i don tsam zhig 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Only the mere meaning of the word is established.üîΩBecause it is impermanent and because it has shape, etc.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir dbyibs dang ldan ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni grangs can dag mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir dbyibs dang ldan ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni grangs can dag mi rtag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The SƒÅ·πÉkhyas say, ‚ÄúBecause it is impermanent, it is not permanent.

original: blo sems pa med par bsgrub pa dang / dbang phyug tu smra ba dag dbyibs dang ldan pa'i phyir sa stengs dag khyad par du 'phags pa'i blo sngon du 'gro ba can du grub pa dag kyang ma grub pa yin par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: blo sems pa med par bsgrub pa dang / dbang phyug tu smra ba dag dbyibs dang ldan pa'i phyir sa stengs dag khyad par du 'phags pa'i blo sngon du 'gro ba can du grub pa dag kyang ma grub pa yin par bshad pa'o //
translated: The proof that there is no intelligent agent, and the proof that the assertion of a divine creator is not established, because of the existence of shape.

original: khyed du 'phags pa'i blo ni dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: khyed du 'phags pa'i blo ni dbang phyug ste /
translated: The intelligent agent is God,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo des bya bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo des bya bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: and that omniscient agent is the one who desires to create.

original: de la yang zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa dang dbyibs dang ldan pa dag go //
analyzed: de la yang zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa dang dbyibs dang ldan pa dag go //
translated: And that, etc. refers to impermanence and the existence of shape.

original: de dag las mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba sgra nyid tsam du bshad pa'i phyir nyams pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de dag las mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba sgra nyid tsam du bshad pa'i phyir nyams pa'i bdag nyid ces bya ba smos te /
translated: Because of impermanence, etc. is explained as just the word sound, so ‚Äúthe nature of destruction‚Äù is mentioned.

original: nyams pa ni yod pa gtan sa med pa'i 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa ni yod pa gtan sa med pa'i 'jig pa'o //
translated: Destruction is the annihilation of what exists.

original: nye bar zhi ba'i mi rtag pa ni mi mngon rgyu la gnas pa'o zhes grangs can dag gis 'dod pa de nyams pa'i rang bzhin mi rtag pa yin par pha rol grangs can mi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba'i mi rtag pa ni mi mngon rgyu la gnas pa'o zhes grangs can dag gis 'dod pa de nyams pa'i rang bzhin mi rtag pa yin par pha rol grangs can mi 'dod pa'o //
translated: The opponent, the Samkhya, does not assert that impermanence is the nature of destruction.

original: de'i phyir rgol ba nyid la ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgol ba nyid la ma grub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not established for the opponent.

original: yang na grangs can gyi sangs rgyas pa las ma grub pa'i phyir gnyi ga lam grub pa'o //üîΩgal te spyir grub pa la zhes bya ba mi rtag pa zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spyir grub pa'i phyir bye brag nyams @271a * //
analyzed: yang na grangs can gyi sangs rgyas pa las ma grub pa'i phyir gnyi ga lam grub pa'o // gal te spyir grub pa la zhes bya ba mi rtag pa zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spyir grub pa'i phyir bye brag nyams @271a * //
translated: Or, because it is not established for the Buddhist Samkhya, it is not established for both.

original: ba'i mi rtag pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i mi rtag zhes brtag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: ba'i mi rtag pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i mi rtag zhes brtag par mi bya ste /
translated: If it is said that in general it is established, because the general term impermanence is established, then the specific impermanence of destruction and the impermanence of complete peace should not be investigated.

original: spyir grub ba la bye brag tu rtogs par byed na lan phyin ci log ste 'bras bu mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ltag chod yin te khyed la byas pa nyid bum par gyur pa'am /
analyzed: spyir grub ba la bye brag tu rtogs par byed na lan phyin ci log ste 'bras bu mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ltag chod yin te khyed la byas pa nyid bum par gyur pa'am /
translated: If one makes a specific understanding of what is generally established, the answer is reversed, it is a reductio argument with the same consequence.

original: sgrar gyur pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrar gyur pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: it becomes sound.

original: gnyi ga yang 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni grangs can dang phyir rgol ba dag la'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni grangs can dang phyir rgol ba dag la'o //
translated: Both refers to the SƒÅ·πÉkhya and the opponent.

original: spyi'i dngos po mi rtag pa zhes bya ba gnyi ga la mthun par grub pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i dngos po mi rtag pa zhes bya ba gnyi ga la mthun par grub pa'o //
translated: Impermanent, which is a general thing, is established in common for both.

original: mthun par grub pa'i dper brjod pa ni dper na byas pa'i phyir bya ba'i gtan tshigs lta bu'o //
analyzed: mthun par grub pa'i dper brjod pa ni dper na byas pa'i phyir bya ba'i gtan tshigs lta bu'o //
translated: An example of an established common example is, for instance, because it is produced, which is a reason for impermanence.

original: gal te 'di yang sangs rgyas ba dang grangs can dag la spyir grub pa med de de dag ni yod pa nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba byas ba yin par 'dod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di yang sangs rgyas ba dang grangs can dag la spyir grub pa med de de dag ni yod pa nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba byas ba yin par 'dod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: If this is not established in common for the Buddhist and the SƒÅ·πÉkhya, because they assert that existence is produced by the manifestation of what was not manifest, then how is it that the master NƒÅgƒÅrjuna said, Because it is produced, it is impermanent?

original: byas pa de tshad mas grub pa'i dbang du byas te grub bar brjod pa yin gyi grub pa'i mtha'i dbang du byas na ni ma grub ba yin no zhes 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byas pa de tshad mas grub pa'i dbang du byas te grub bar brjod pa yin gyi grub pa'i mtha'i dbang du byas na ni ma grub ba yin no zhes 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That production is established from the perspective of being established by valid cognition, but it is not established from the perspective of tenets. This will be explained later.

original: mi mngon pa nyid yod pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba'i spyir grub pa yin te nyams ba dang nye bar zhi ba gnyi ga yang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du gnyi ga 'dod pa'i phyir ro snyam pa'o //
analyzed: mi mngon pa nyid yod pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba'i spyir grub pa yin te nyams ba dang nye bar zhi ba gnyi ga yang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin du gnyi ga 'dod pa'i phyir ro snyam pa'o //
translated: The general proof is this: both destruction and pacification are asserted to be of the nature of nonclarity.

original: pha rol gyi mi rtag pa nyid de lta bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa nyid nye bar zhi ba lta bu mi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi mi rtag pa nyid de lta bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa nyid nye bar zhi ba lta bu mi 'dod pa'o //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs reply is ‚ÄúImpermanence is not like that,‚Äù because Buddhists, etc., do not assert that impermanence is pacification.

original: mtshan nyid 'di zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid mi mthong ba 'dis so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'di zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid mi mthong ba 'dis so //
translated: The response is ‚ÄúBy this nonseeing of the characteristic of impermanence,‚Äù that is, by this nonseeing of the characteristic of impermanence.

original: gtso bo dang skye sa bu dag kyang mi rtag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gtso bo dang skye sa bu dag kyang mi rtag par 'gyur te /
translated: The reply is ‚ÄúPrimordial matter and the self would be impermanent.‚ÄùüîΩThe SƒÅ·πÉkhyas assert that primordial matter is not seen.

original: de dag kyang grangs can gyi gzhung las mi mthong bar 'dod de 'di ltar ;
analyzed: de dag kyang grangs can gyi gzhung las mi mthong bar 'dod de 'di ltar ;
translated: As it says,

original: kva yi rnam shes su yis shes //
analyzed: kva yi rnam shes su yis shes //
translated: Who knows consciousness?

original: zhes bya ba dang gtso bo ni mi mthong ba'i tshigs su 'jug go zhes smra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang gtso bo ni mi mthong ba'i tshigs su 'jug go zhes smra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And it says, ‚ÄúPrimordial matter is not seen.‚Äù

original: gal te snga ma'i chos las gzhan pa'i mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gsal bas mi gsal bar 'gyur ba'i mi gsal ba ni rtag par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te snga ma'i chos las gzhan pa'i mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gsal bas mi gsal bar 'gyur ba'i mi gsal ba ni rtag par 'dod pa'o //
translated: If it is argued that the so-called nonmanifest is something other than the previous manifest entity, then the nonmanifest would be nonmanifest because of the previous manifest entity.

original: chos snga ma las kyang gzhan la zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba sngar gsal ba las mi 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chos snga ma las kyang gzhan la zhes bya ba ni mi gsal ba sngar gsal ba las mi 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: And if it is argued that it is something other than the previous entity, then the nonmanifest would be different from the previous manifest entity.

original: mi nyams pa'i bum ba'i rdzas rtag par yang 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mi nyams pa'i bum ba'i rdzas rtag par yang 'dod pa'o //
translated: And it is also asserted that the substance of the nondecaying pot is permanent.

original: gnas skabs ldog pa zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i gsal ba dang mi gsal pa'i gnas skabs ldog pa ste /
analyzed: gnas skabs ldog pa zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i gsal ba dang mi gsal pa'i gnas skabs ldog pa ste /
translated: The so-called reversal of state is the reversal of the manifest and unmanifest states of the pot.

original: de'i 'jig bar smra @271b ba'o ;
analyzed: de'i 'jig bar smra @271b ba'o ;
translated: That is what is said to be its destruction.

original: / de nyid bshad pa'i phyir gang yang gnas skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: / de nyid bshad pa'i phyir gang yang gnas skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: In order to explain that, he says, ‚ÄúThat is also the case with the reversal of state, etc.‚Äù

original: mtshungs par brjod de zhes bya ba ni nyes bar dran par ro //
analyzed: mtshungs par brjod de zhes bya ba ni nyes bar dran par ro //
translated: It is said to be similar, that is, it is remembered as a fault.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir de yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir de yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, ‚ÄúThat is also the case with the reversal of state, etc.‚Äù

original: gnas skabs ldog pa de'i yang ngo //
analyzed: gnas skabs ldog pa de'i yang ngo //
translated: That is also the case with the reversal of state.

original: mi nyams pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni gang 'gal ba yin pa'o //
analyzed: mi nyams pa yang yin no zhes bya ba ni gang 'gal ba yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is also non-ceasing‚Äù is the contradiction.

original: de ldog na cig shos ma log kyang zhes bya ba ni chu 'dzin ba'i gnas skabs de log na cig shos gnas skabs can ma log ste /
analyzed: de ldog na cig shos ma log kyang zhes bya ba ni chu 'dzin ba'i gnas skabs de log na cig shos gnas skabs can ma log ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen that ceases, the other does not cease‚Äù means that when the state of holding water ceases, the state of having a state does not cease.

original: phra ba'i rang bzhin gyi bum par gtso bo la zhi bas gnas skabs kyang de thams cad mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: phra ba'i rang bzhin gyi bum par gtso bo la zhi bas gnas skabs kyang de thams cad mi 'byung ste /
translated: The subtle nature of the pot is the state of being the principal, and all of that does not occur.

original: bum pa de /
analyzed: bum pa de /
translated: That pot

original: thams cad du med do zhes rtogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad du med do zhes rtogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: is understood to be nonexistent everywhere. This is the meaning.

original: de'i gnas skabs de nyid ces bya ba ni chu 'dzin pa'i gnas skabs de nyid do //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs de nyid ces bya ba ni chu 'dzin pa'i gnas skabs de nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúThat very state of it‚Äù means that very state of holding water.

original: de yang log ba zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i mtshan nyid du chu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang log ba zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i mtshan nyid du chu 'dzin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat also ceases‚Äù means that the characteristic of the pot is holding water.

original: mi ldog pa'i gnas skabs can gyi nus pa'i rdzas gnas par 'dod pa ni brgal zhing brtag par bya ba yin te zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i tha snyad yin no zhes sngar bshad pa'i nyes pas gos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi ldog pa'i gnas skabs can gyi nus pa'i rdzas gnas par 'dod pa ni brgal zhing brtag par bya ba yin te zhes bya ba 'gal ba'i tha snyad yin no zhes sngar bshad pa'i nyes pas gos par 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe substance of the potency that has a non-ceasing state is asserted to endure‚Äù is the conventional contradiction. As explained before, it would be tainted by the fault.

original: 'di ltar bum ba de'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mod pa ma yin la gal te bum pa yod na yang bum pa chag pa ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar bum ba de'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir mod pa ma yin la gal te bum pa yod na yang bum pa chag pa ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the pot does not exist without the characteristics of a pot, and even if the pot exists, it is not a pot that is not broken.

original: gal te dngos po gcig pa nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i dngos po gcig yin yang ngo //
analyzed: gal te dngos po gcig pa nyid yin na yang zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i dngos po gcig yin yang ngo //
translated: If it is the same entity, even though it is the same entity of a person,

original: gnas skabs gos dang rgyan dang spyod pas tha dad pa mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gnas skabs gos dang rgyan dang spyod pas tha dad pa mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: it is seen that there is a difference in the condition, such as clothing, ornaments, and behavior.

original: gnas skabs tha dad ba de nyid dngos po'i tha dad pa yin te dngos po nyid gzhan dang gzhan du skyes ba yin gyi gnas skabs can gyi dngos po logs gcig na ni med pa'i phyir de nyid dngos bo tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du cis na mi
analyzed: gnas skabs tha dad ba de nyid dngos po'i tha dad pa yin te dngos po nyid gzhan dang gzhan du skyes ba yin gyi gnas skabs can gyi dngos po logs gcig na ni med pa'i phyir de nyid dngos bo tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du cis na mi
translated: That very difference in condition is a difference in entity, because the entity itself is born as another and another. Since the entity that has a condition does not exist separately, why not accept that very difference in condition as the characteristic of a difference in entity?

original: 'dod de 'dod bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod de 'dod bar bya'o //
translated: It should be accepted.

original: 'dod pa de lta bas na bde ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa de lta bas na bde ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Since that is accepted, pleasure and so onüîΩare not the same entity as the person.

original: snying stobs bde ba nyid sdug bsngal ba nyid mun pa btang snyoms nyid tha dad pa dang bems po de dag dang skyes bu shes pa yod pa dag tu tha dad pa nyid yin pa la the tshom med do //
analyzed: snying stobs bde ba nyid sdug bsngal ba nyid mun pa btang snyoms nyid tha dad pa dang bems po de dag dang skyes bu shes pa yod pa dag tu tha dad pa nyid yin pa la the tshom med do //
translated: There is no doubt that courage is pleasure, pain is suffering, darkness is equanimity, and that which is different and inanimate is the existence of consciousness in a person.

original: gal te tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin yang dngos po tha dad pa ma yin na ni bde ba la sogs ba yang dngos po tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid yin yang dngos po tha dad pa ma yin na ni bde ba la sogs ba yang dngos po tha dad par mi 'grub bo //
translated: If, although having different characteristics, they are not different things, then pleasure, etc. are not established as different things.

original: gnas skabs tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni zlos gar mkhan gyi skyes bu dga' byed @272a * //
analyzed: gnas skabs tha dad kyang zhes bya ba ni zlos gar mkhan gyi skyes bu dga' byed @272a * //
translated: Even though the states are different, the person who is an actor,üîΩin the states of being golden-colored, black, etc.

original: kyi gnas skabs gser gyi mdog can dang nor bu bum rna'i gnas skabs nag po la sogs pa tha dad kyang de nyid gzugs rjes su byed de yod bas na gnas skabs can gzugs ni rtag par yod bar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: kyi gnas skabs gser gyi mdog can dang nor bu bum rna'i gnas skabs nag po la sogs pa tha dad kyang de nyid gzugs rjes su byed de yod bas na gnas skabs can gzugs ni rtag par yod bar 'grub ce na /
translated: is the same, because he is the one who acts. Therefore, form is established as always existing, because it exists.

original: de'i bde ba la sogs pa nang rnams dang / de dag dang skyes bu rnams su yang mtshungs par 'gyur te de dag kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / btang snyoms dang / bems po dang shes pa yod ba dag gnas skabs tha dad pa yin gyi dngos po gcig nyid du mtshungs par thal bar 'gyur bas na khyed kyi tha snyad la gnod do //
analyzed: de'i bde ba la sogs pa nang rnams dang / de dag dang skyes bu rnams su yang mtshungs par 'gyur te de dag kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / btang snyoms dang / bems po dang shes pa yod ba dag gnas skabs tha dad pa yin gyi dngos po gcig nyid du mtshungs par thal bar 'gyur bas na khyed kyi tha snyad la gnod do //
translated: The pleasure, etc. of that person, and the person himself, would be the same as the internal, because they are pleasure, pain, indifference, matter, and consciousness, and they are different states, but it is not correct that they are the same thing.

original: gal te tha dad na rim gyis gsal ba 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad ba dag gi ba lang gi rva g-yas g-yon ltar dus gcig tu gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te tha dad na rim gyis gsal ba 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tha dad ba dag gi ba lang gi rva g-yas g-yon ltar dus gcig tu gsal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If they are different, then it is contradictory that they are manifest simultaneously, because they are different, like the right and left horns of an ox.

original: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa ni sems pa can sems pa med ba dag cig car gsal ba'i phyir tha dad par 'gyur la bum pa'i chu 'dzin pa ni rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir de dag gcig ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir bde ba la sogs pa ni sems pa can sems pa med ba dag cig car gsal ba'i phyir tha dad par 'gyur la bum pa'i chu 'dzin pa ni rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir de dag gcig ba nyid do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since pleasure, etc. and the sentient being are manifest simultaneously, they would be different, but the water held in a pot is manifest gradually, so they are the same.

original: rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir gcig dang gcig nyid yin pa de lta na da ni bum pa dang zho la sogs pa ji ltar du ma nyid yin te /
analyzed: rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir gcig dang gcig nyid yin pa de lta na da ni bum pa dang zho la sogs pa ji ltar du ma nyid yin te /
translated: If that is so, then how can a vase, yogurt, and so on be many?

original: gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyor ci'i phyir zhe na ;
analyzed: gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyor ci'i phyir zhe na ;
translated: It follows that they are one.

original: du mar bzhag ba'i mtshan nyid gcig par gsal ba zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba'i rim gyis gsal ba dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: du mar bzhag ba'i mtshan nyid gcig par gsal ba zhes bya ba dang 'gal ba'i rim gyis gsal ba dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Why? Because the characteristic of being many is incompatible with the characteristic of being manifest as one, since gradual manifestation is observed.

original: thog mar ni bum pa grub la de nas de la brten pa'i zho la sogs pa gsal ba'i phyir zlos gar mkhan ltar gcig par thal bar 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: thog mar ni bum pa grub la de nas de la brten pa'i zho la sogs pa gsal ba'i phyir zlos gar mkhan ltar gcig par thal bar 'gyur bas so //
translated: Since a vase is established first and then yogurt and so on that depend on it are manifest, it follows that they are one, like an actor.

original: de lta na tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid rim pa ma yin par gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma khyab pa'i skyon chags la gcig ba'i mtshan nyid rim gyis gsal ba ni khyab ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta na tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid rim pa ma yin par gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma khyab pa'i skyon chags la gcig ba'i mtshan nyid rim gyis gsal ba ni khyab ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, the characteristic of being different is not gradual manifestation, so it is faulty because it is not a universal characteristic. The characteristic of being one is gradual manifestation, so it is faulty because it is too broad.

original: yang na rim pa ma yin par gsal ba'i phyir bum ba dang zho la sogs ba tha dad ba nyid yin zhes bya ba ni de dag rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid rim ma yin par gsal ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: yang na rim pa ma yin par gsal ba'i phyir bum ba dang zho la sogs ba tha dad ba nyid yin zhes bya ba ni de dag rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid rim ma yin par gsal ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang /
translated: Or, because of the manifestation of the pot and yogurt, etc., without order, they are different. This is because the characteristic of difference is the manifestation without order, and that is incompatible with the characteristic of identity, the manifestation with order.

original: gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rim gyis gsal ba yod pa'i phyir ji ltar du ma nyid yin te ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rim gyis gsal ba yod pa'i phyir ji ltar du ma nyid yin te ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And because the characteristic of identity, the manifestation with order, exists, how can there be multiplicity? The meaning is that there cannot be.

original: rim gyis gsal ba la tha mi dad pas khyab ba ma grub pa'i phyir dang @272b zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang zho la sogs pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: rim gyis gsal ba la tha mi dad pas khyab ba ma grub pa'i phyir dang @272b zhes bya ba ni bum pa dang zho la sogs pa nyid kyis te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúbecause the non-establishment of the pervasion of the manifestation with order by the non-difference of the pot and yogurt, etc., is not established‚Äù means that the pot and yogurt, etc.,

original: rim gyis gsal yang tha mi dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim gyis gsal yang tha mi dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are not different because they manifest with order.

original: ci zhig 'gal zhes bya ba ni rim gyis snang ba dang tha dad pa dag go //
analyzed: ci zhig 'gal zhes bya ba ni rim gyis snang ba dang tha dad pa dag go //
translated: What is the contradiction? The manifestation with order and the difference.

original: gal te bum pa dang zho la sogs pa rim gyis snang ba yang ci'i rgyu yin zhe na rim gyis yin pa ni zho dang bum pa de'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gal te bum pa dang zho la sogs pa rim gyis snang ba yang ci'i rgyu yin zhe na rim gyis yin pa ni zho dang bum pa de'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: If it is asked what is the cause of the gradual appearance of the pot, yogurt, and so on, it is because the pot and yogurt are the effect of that cause.

original: rgyu de ma grub na 'bras bu mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu de ma grub na 'bras bu mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if the cause is not established, the effect is not established.

original: des na rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir snga phyi tha dad pa nyid du 'grub po //
analyzed: des na rim gyis gsal ba'i phyir snga phyi tha dad pa nyid du 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, because of the gradual manifestation, it is established that they are different in terms of earlier and later.

original: gal te tha mi dad na cha shas med pa'i phyir rim ma yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te tha mi dad na cha shas med pa'i phyir rim ma yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If they are not different, it follows that they are not gradual because they are partless.

original: gcig gi bdag nyid gsal ba nyid gcig bzhin no //
analyzed: gcig gi bdag nyid gsal ba nyid gcig bzhin no //
translated: Because the manifestation of one is the same as one.

original: gal te 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir tha mi dad do zhes bya ba ni grangs can ba dag ni 'bras bu rgyu'i rang bzhin du yod par 'dod pas so //
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir tha mi dad do zhes bya ba ni grangs can ba dag ni 'bras bu rgyu'i rang bzhin du yod par 'dod pas so //
translated: If it is said that they are not different because they are effects, the SƒÅ·πÉkhyas assert that the effect exists as the nature of the cause.

original: gal te 'grel pa grub na zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu nyid gcig pa dang ngo //
analyzed: gal te 'grel pa grub na zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu nyid gcig pa dang ngo //
translated: If it is established that it is an effect, it is the same as the cause.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: And that is the connection.

original: bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs ba rjes su 'gro ba med na gnyis la the tshom za ba'i skabs su'o //
analyzed: bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni srog la sogs ba rjes su 'gro ba med na gnyis la the tshom za ba'i skabs su'o //
translated: The response is, It will be explained. That is, if life force and so on are not universal, then there is doubt about the two.

original: 'jig ba dang cig shos dag ces bya ba ni bsags pa dang nye bar zhi ba dang / mi rtag pa dag bye brag med de gnyis grub bar mi gsal ba la sogs pa brtags kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig ba dang cig shos dag ces bya ba ni bsags pa dang nye bar zhi ba dang / mi rtag pa dag bye brag med de gnyis grub bar mi gsal ba la sogs pa brtags kyang ngo //
translated: The phrase destruction and the other refers to the two, accumulation and pacification, which are not distinct from impermanence. Even though they are examined, they are not clearly established as two.

original: spyi'i chos zhes bya ba ni rgol pa la mthun pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i chos zhes bya ba ni rgol pa la mthun pa'o //
translated: The phrase a universal property refers to a property that is accepted by the opponent.

original: mi mthun pa'i dpe ni dper na rgyu rnams la zhes bya ba rkan dang / mchu dang / brjod par 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bas sgra skyes bus byas par 'dod pa dang / rdza mkhan la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bas bum pa byas pa spyir brjod pa lta'o //üîΩ'brel pa tha dad pa dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid ces bya ba'i spyi'i chos gzhan gyis brtags pa la dpyad kyang ste /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i dpe ni dper na rgyu rnams la zhes bya ba rkan dang / mchu dang / brjod par 'dod pa la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bas sgra skyes bus byas par 'dod pa dang / rdza mkhan la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro bas bum pa byas pa spyir brjod pa lta'o //üîΩ'brel pa tha dad pa dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid ces bya ba'i spyi'i chos gzhan gyis brtags pa la dpyad kyang ste /

original: de med kyang byas pa nyid tshad mas grub po //
analyzed: de med kyang byas pa nyid tshad mas grub po //
translated: Even though that is not the case, the fact of being produced is established by a valid cognition.

original: gzhan yang bum pa'i byas pa dang sgra'i byas pa chos can dang 'brel pa'i tha dad pa zhes bya ba bye brag ma spyad kyang byas pa spyi gnyi ga la grub po //
analyzed: gzhan yang bum pa'i byas pa dang sgra'i byas pa chos can dang 'brel pa'i tha dad pa zhes bya ba bye brag ma spyad kyang byas pa spyi gnyi ga la grub po //
translated: Moreover, even though the difference called ‚Äúthe producedness of a pot‚Äù and ‚Äúthe producedness of a sound‚Äù is not employed as a universal, the producedness in general is established in both.

original: dmigs na ni der 'gyur ro zhes bya ba spyi grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs na ni der 'gyur ro zhes bya ba spyi grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If it is perceived, then it is so.

original: ci ste skabs nyid gtan tshigs su brjod na yang der spyi grub kyang ma nges pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir 'brel ba legs par dpyad par bya ba yin te /üîΩ'bral pa des bsgrub par bya ba @273a * //
analyzed: ci ste skabs nyid gtan tshigs su brjod na yang der spyi grub kyang ma nges pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir 'brel ba legs par dpyad par bya ba yin te / 'bral pa des bsgrub par bya ba @273a * //
translated: Even if the context itself is stated as the reason, the establishment of the universal is not ascertained, so the relation must be properly examined.

original: 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the probandum is established by that relation.

original: ji ltar khang bzangs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni ba lang gi gnas khang dang / tshong khang gi skabs la sogs par blo sngon du btang bas byas pa'i rnam par rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar khang bzangs la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni ba lang gi gnas khang dang / tshong khang gi skabs la sogs par blo sngon du btang bas byas pa'i rnam par rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: As for ‚Äúin a mansion, etc.,‚Äù the mind is directed in advance to the context of a cow pen, a shop, etc., and the form is in accordance with that.

original: gal te mthong na ni zhes bya ba ni sa'i snying dang ri la sogs pa yang de lta bu'i dbyibs kyi rnam par mthong na'o //
analyzed: gal te mthong na ni zhes bya ba ni sa'i snying dang ri la sogs pa yang de lta bu'i dbyibs kyi rnam par mthong na'o //
translated: If it is seen, then the earth, the heart of the earth, the mountain, etc. are seen in that shape.

original: de bzhin du gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, it is a reason.

original: zhes bya ba ni khang bzangs la sogs pa de bzhin du spyir grub pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khang bzangs la sogs pa de bzhin du spyir grub pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur /
translated: The reason is established in general, as in the case of the palace, etc.

original: skyes bu'i byed pa ni shing mkhan la sogs pa'i byed pa yod pa dang med pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu'i byed pa ni shing mkhan la sogs pa'i byed pa yod pa dang med pa'o //
translated: The action of a person is the existence and non-existence of the action of a carpenter, etc.

original: rjes su 'jug can ni de dang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa can no //
analyzed: rjes su 'jug can ni de dang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa can no //
translated: The subsequent is that which has conformity and reversal with that.

original: de ni khang bzangs la dang rta babs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni khang bzangs la dang rta babs la sogs pa'o //
translated: That is the palace, the arch, etc.

original: de lta bur sa stengs kyi dbyibs la sogs te kha dogs la sogs pa gang mthong bar 'grub na dbyibs de'i phyir blo sngon du song ba gang zhig dpag pa de'i rigs te /
analyzed: de lta bur sa stengs kyi dbyibs la sogs te kha dogs la sogs pa gang mthong bar 'grub na dbyibs de'i phyir blo sngon du song ba gang zhig dpag pa de'i rigs te /
translated: In that way, if the shape of the earth, etc. is established as seen, then the cognition that precedes the inference of that shape is of that type.

original: dngos po mtshungs par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po mtshungs par 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established as similar to the thing.

original: gzhan du dngos po tha dad grub pa la zhes bya ba ni dbyibs dag rigs kyi 'dra ba ri dang khang bzangs la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan du dngos po tha dad grub pa la zhes bya ba ni dbyibs dag rigs kyi 'dra ba ri dang khang bzangs la sogs pa la /
translated: Otherwise, if there were establishment of difference of entity means that in the case of mountains, mansions, etc., which are similar in type, the shapes are different.

original: sgra mtshungs tha dad med ba yis //
analyzed: sgra mtshungs tha dad med ba yis //
translated: By the same sound, there is no difference.

original: dbyibs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sgra mtshungs so //
analyzed: dbyibs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni sgra mtshungs so //
translated: Endowed with shape means by the same sound.

original: skye bo yis brdzangs sogs te gyen du 'gro ba tsam la sogs pas so //
analyzed: skye bo yis brdzangs sogs te gyen du 'gro ba tsam la sogs pas so //
translated: By the people's sending, etc., just by the mere going up, etc.

original: don tha dad kyang sgra mtshungs pas rtogs na 'ji ba'i rnam par 'gyur bas phung dang bum pa la sogs pa'i byed pa por rdza mkhan grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don tha dad kyang sgra mtshungs pas rtogs na 'ji ba'i rnam par 'gyur bas phung dang bum pa la sogs pa'i byed pa por rdza mkhan grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one understands the difference in meaning by the same sound, then because of the transformation of clay, the potter is established as the maker of heaps, pots, etc.

original: grog mkhar yang 'ji ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir rdza mkhan gyis byas par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grog mkhar yang 'ji ba'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir rdza mkhan gyis byas par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because an anthill is also a transformation of clay, it would be established as made by a potter.

original: bsgrub byas khyab pa ni mi rtag pa'i rjes su 'gro ba spyi yis zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid gnyi ga la grub pas so //
analyzed: bsgrub byas khyab pa ni mi rtag pa'i rjes su 'gro ba spyi yis zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid gnyi ga la grub pas so //
translated: The pervasion by the probandum is by the universal of the concomitance of impermanence, because both are established as produced.

original: 'brel pa'i tha dad smras pa yis //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i tha dad smras pa yis //
translated: By the statement of the difference of relation,

original: zhes bya ba ni sgras gyur pa'i byas pa bum pa la med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med par mtshungs so zhes klan ka bas smras pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgras gyur pa'i byas pa bum pa la med pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med par mtshungs so zhes klan ka bas smras pa'o //
translated: This is the opponent's rejoinder: The non-existence of the product which is a transformation of sound in the pot is similar to the non-existence of the universal pot in the product.

original: skyon ni zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pas so //üîΩdes don 'bras bur mtshungs par yin pa 'dong /
analyzed: skyon ni zhes bya ba ni sun 'byin pas so // des don 'bras bur mtshungs par yin pa 'dong /
translated: The fault is the refutation.üîΩ The meaning is: The non-existence of the product which is a transformation of sound in the pot is similar to the non-existence of the universal pot in the product.

original: ces pa ltag chod kyi bye brag 'bras bu mtshungs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ces pa ltag chod kyi bye brag 'bras bu mtshungs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is a particular kind of reductio called similarity of effect.

original: rigs gzhan par ni bya ba dngos po rigs mi mthun par grub pa la'o //
analyzed: rigs gzhan par ni bya ba dngos po rigs mi mthun par grub pa la'o //
translated: In the case of a different type, the action is established as a different type of entity.

analyzed: sgrub byed mi rigs gong bu bzhin // zhes bya ba ni sgra @273b mtshungs par sgrub par byed par mi rigs te /

analyzed: dngos bo grub pa ma yin la //üîΩzhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel ba dag go //

original: ma grub ba rigs zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa dang ma nges pa la sogs pa phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel ba dang ma grub bar rigs so //
analyzed: ma grub ba rigs zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa dang ma nges pa la sogs pa phyogs kyi chos dang 'brel ba dang ma grub bar rigs so //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúit is reasonable to say that it is not established‚Äù means that it is reasonable to say that the property of the position is not established, that it is not ascertained, and so on.

original: grub na ni zhes bya ba dngos po la 'dod ba'i rtags dang rjes su 'gro ba grub na /
analyzed: grub na ni zhes bya ba dngos po la 'dod ba'i rtags dang rjes su 'gro ba grub na /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúif it is established‚Äù means that if the evidence and the forward pervasion are established in relation to the property of the position,

original: rtags kyi don ma grub kyang ma grub pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rtags kyi don ma grub kyang ma grub pa'i nyes par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: then even if the meaning of the evidence is not established, there is no fault of nonestablishment.

original: dper na / sgra yi nam mkha' rten sogs pa'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dper na / sgra yi nam mkha' rten sogs pa'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: For example, the phrase ‚Äúsound is the quality of space‚Äù is used.

original: sgra la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang 'brel pa'i byas pa dang byas pa de nyid nam mkha'i yon tan dang rjes su 'gro ba nyid ma grub kyang byas pas mi rtag pa grub ba'i phyir brjod ba bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid dang 'brel pa'i byas pa dang byas pa de nyid nam mkha'i yon tan dang rjes su 'gro ba nyid ma grub kyang byas pas mi rtag pa grub ba'i phyir brjod ba bzhin no //
translated: Even though the production that is related to the quality of space in sound and the quality of space that is the forward pervasion of that production are not established, impermanence is established by production.

original: 'ug pa ba ni bye brag pa'o //
analyzed: 'ug pa ba ni bye brag pa'o //
translated: The owl is the Vai≈õe·π£ika.

original: sgrub byed / lus can la sogs smra ba /
analyzed: sgrub byed / lus can la sogs smra ba /
translated: The proponent of the thesis is the proponent of the thesis of embodied and so on.

original: bzhin ; / zhes bya ba ni lus can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bya bar smras pa na /
analyzed: bzhin ; / zhes bya ba ni lus can yin pa'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bya bar smras pa na /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúlike that‚Äù means that when it is said, ‚ÄúIt is impermanent because it is embodied,‚Äù

original: sangs rgyas ba la 'ug pa pas 'dod pa'i lus rtag pa nyid dang thams cad du song ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma zhes bya ba'i chos brtags pa'i sgra mtshan nyid de dag gi ma grub kyang reg par bya ba nyid kyi lus rtags
analyzed: sangs rgyas ba la 'ug pa pas 'dod pa'i lus rtag pa nyid dang thams cad du song ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni tshad ma zhes bya ba'i chos brtags pa'i sgra mtshan nyid de dag gi ma grub kyang reg par bya ba nyid kyi lus rtags
translated: Even though the words and characteristics of the Dharma that is investigated are not established, the body that is to be touched is established as a sign.

original: su 'dod pa grub pa'i phyir don grub ba bzhin no //
analyzed: su 'dod pa grub pa'i phyir don grub ba bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is established, just like the example.

original: gal te de ltar slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos byas ba phyir rgol ba grangs can la ma grub po zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te de ltar slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos byas ba phyir rgol ba grangs can la ma grub po zhes bshad pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is like that, didn‚Äôt master DignƒÅga explain that ‚Äúbecause it is made‚Äù is not established for the SƒÅ·πÉkhya opponent?

original: de'i phyir byas pa yang spyir grub pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir byas pa yang spyir grub pa med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, ‚Äúmade‚Äù is also not established in general.

original: gang yang bstan bcos la brten pa'i cig shos la ma grub par slob dpon gyis gsungs so //
analyzed: gang yang bstan bcos la brten pa'i cig shos la ma grub par slob dpon gyis gsungs so //
translated: Also, the master said that ‚Äúthe other‚Äù is not established in dependence on the treatise.

original: ji skad du gsungs she na /
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs she na /
translated: How is it said?

original: mngon par gsal ba smra ba la byas pa nyid ma grub po zhes so //
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba smra ba la byas pa nyid ma grub po zhes so //
translated: ‚ÄúFor the proponent of manifestation, ‚Äòmade‚Äô is not established.‚Äù

original: de la mngon par gsal ba smra ba ni grangs can te /
analyzed: de la mngon par gsal ba smra ba ni grangs can te /
translated: The proponent of manifestation is the SƒÅ·πÉkhya.

original: mi mngon par rgyu dag gis mngon par byas kyi med ba las rgyus byas bar mi 'dod pas so //
analyzed: mi mngon par rgyu dag gis mngon par byas kyi med ba las rgyus byas bar mi 'dod pas so //
translated: It is not asserted that what is not manifest is produced by causes, because it is not produced from a cause.

original: rjes su dpag par thams cad la zhes bya bas ni lung la brten pa'i dang / dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa dag go //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par thams cad la zhes bya bas ni lung la brten pa'i dang / dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa dag go //
translated: With in all inferences, it refers to those that are based on scripture and those that are based on the power of fact.

original: tshad mas mthong ba la zhes bya ba byas pa nyid rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog bar tshad mas grub pa la'o //
analyzed: tshad mas mthong ba la zhes bya ba byas pa nyid rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog bar tshad mas grub pa la'o //
translated: With in all valid cognitions, it refers to the establishment by valid cognition of the concomitance and reversal of being produced.

original: dam bca' @274a * //üîΩbsam grub par brtsad par mi rigs ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni grangs can gyi grub mtha' ma grub pas ma grub par bya bar mi rigs pa'o //
analyzed: dam bca' @274a * // bsam grub par brtsad par mi rigs ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni grangs can gyi grub mtha' ma grub pas ma grub par bya bar mi rigs pa'o //
translated: Thesis means what is to be proven.üîΩBecause it is unreasonable to debate what is not established, it is unreasonable to refute what is not established by the tenets of the SƒÅ·πÉkhya.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni bstan bcos kyi dbang du byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa ni bstan bcos la mi brten pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni bstan bcos kyi dbang du byas pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa ni bstan bcos la mi brten pa'o //
translated: With inference is not based on treatises, it refers to those based on the power of fact, which do not rely on treatises.

original: de'i phyir mtshan ma kho nas dngos po stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa de la gnod kyi lung gis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan ma kho nas dngos po stobs kyis zhugs pa'i rjes su dpag pa de la gnod kyi lung gis ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the inference that engages the power of the thing through a sign alone is undermined, but not by scripture.

original: gal te tshad mas rtogs pa ma yin te /üîΩtshad mas grub pa las bye brag tu bya ba'i don ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te tshad mas rtogs pa ma yin te / tshad mas grub pa las bye brag tu bya ba'i don ma yin na /
translated: If it is not understood by valid knowledge,üîΩif it is not a meaning that is distinguished from what is established by valid knowledge,

original: ci mngon par gsal ba smra ba la zhes gsungs te ma grub po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig tu gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci mngon par gsal ba smra ba la zhes gsungs te ma grub po zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig tu gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then why is it said, ‚Äúin the case of manifest objects‚Äù? It is not established.

original: de bas na mngon par gsal ba la zhes bya bas ni lung la ltos te gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas na mngon par gsal ba la zhes bya bas ni lung la ltos te gsungs so //
translated: Thus, ‚Äúin the case of manifest objects‚Äù is said in reliance on scripture.üîΩOtherwise, ‚Äúin the case of what is not known‚Äù is said.

original: gzhan du ni mi shes pa nyid la de skad ces bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos las ma grub pa las gzhan du dngos po la zhugs pa la ni tshad mas ma shes pa tsam la ste /
analyzed: gzhan du ni mi shes pa nyid la de skad ces bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos las ma grub pa las gzhan du dngos po la zhugs pa la ni tshad mas ma shes pa tsam la ste /
translated: In the treatise, ‚Äúin the case of what is not established‚Äù is said in the case of engagement with things other than that.

original: ma rtogs pa tsam la de skad ces bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa zhes te /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa tsam la de skad ces bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa zhes te /
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of mere nonunderstanding‚Äù is said in the case of mere nonrealization.

original: mngon par gsal bar smra ba la zhes bye brag tu mi dgos pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par gsal bar smra ba la zhes bye brag tu mi dgos pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the case of manifest objects‚Äù is said in the case of the proponent of manifest objects.

original: yang na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan te /
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan te /
translated: ‚ÄúOr‚Äù indicates another alternative.

original: de zhes bya ba mngon par gsal ba smra ba la byas pa ma grub pa zhes bya ba smra ba de'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba mngon par gsal ba smra ba la byas pa ma grub pa zhes bya ba smra ba de'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the statement of the unestablished basis.
